name: Pragmatic Coders
description:
Our mission is to maximize the chances of entrepreneurs to build successful products. 
We do this by focusing on business value optimization, short delivery times, constant feedback and high investments into the company culture. 
That is why we promise to all of our customers that they will
go-live in less than three months
work with competent, business-oriented people
find partners, not services providers in us
All backed by clear vision, years of experience and deeply embedded core values
Think like a Customers
Take ownership
Make it simple, be pragmatic
Learn fast, learn always
Be team players, be an example
No matter the size of the project, you will have access to the best-in-class Agile management team composed of people who were either consultants, coaches, business owners or Product Owners through most of their careers. 
Simply put:
You bring:
Business Context
Connections
We take care of:
UI/UX designs
Roadmap for investors
The prototype that you can showcase
Technology choices
3rd parties coordination and suggestions (one-stop-shop)
Software development
We are mainly focused on:
Custom software for Fintech, Insuretech, Banking, and IoT
Trading platforms and cryptocurrency exchanges
Blockchain solutions 
Ethereum smart contracts
Cloud applications
